effect.name: TAP Dynamics (M)
effect.description:
TAP Dynamics Mono (LADSPA 2152)
Allows changing the dynamic content of the audio stream
effect.author: http://www.ladspa.org

parameter.name: Dynamics Transfer Function
parameter.paramlistdisplay: 2:1 comp at -6dB,2:1 comp at -9dB,2:1 comp at -12dB,2:1 comp at -18dB,2.5 comp at -18dB,3:1 comp at -12dB,3:1 comp at -15dB,Compressor/Gate,Expander,Hard limiter at -6dB;Hard limiter at -12dB;Hard gate at -35dB;Soft limiter;Soft knee comp/gate;Softgate below -36dB
